Text: Update from 1* to 3*Initial Complaints:Device would not connect to or even pull up a list of wifi options, when sibling devices had no problem doing so.I read this device has issues with modern wifi networks. Might have been the problem, but Amazon denied it.New Review:After my initial review, Amazon support contacted me with a new manual step to try using amazon tap. I'm glad my time and money are no longer wasted. It is a bit frustrating that they kept trying to blame my wifi when all evidence pointed at the device being lacking (including the way the issue was ultimately resolved), but at least this finally works now. If anyone else has a similar issue, make sure they have you try the tap/non-bluetooth method for older devices so you don't have as rough a time getting yours working.Still, I advise looking into their newer devices if you don't want the potential hassle. Echo Pop for example was immediately successful and did not take days of troubleshooting.
Location/Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2024

Text: I'd like to use the product.  I've spent 3 hours trying to set it up.  I worked with software for 35 years and I've had no problem setting up hundreds of other things.They're big problems with his software and they require you to constantly rekey your password and key in a texted number.I think I'm going to send this product back.  I'm about ready to slam it against the wall and it's not worth the hassle.Update: after needlessly waiting for the required 24 hours to reset the OTP passwords, I was able to get it set up and working.  I relied mainly on YouTube videos to do so.  It works okay, but there still needs to be more instructions to be able to do things like easily change the music from the defaulted Amazon music and to use the echo Dot as a bluetooth speaker from my cell phone.  The music quality of the speaker is actually quite good.  I'm changing my ranking from one star to three stars.
Location/Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2024

Text: Save your money and just get the light. I'm glad I got this on sale for half off because there is no way this is worth it full price. I bought it to replace my kids night light, play music, and use white noise. The light works great. Still cannot get the music to work. I want to play Amazon music, but it refuses to recognize anything I try to play even though all the skills are enabled and it's set to default. The only music service I've been able to get working is Pandora, even after researching for hours. I thought the white noise was great, at first. Then the Internet disconnected in the middle of the night and Alexa yells a big long message about the Internet being down and what to do waking my kids up. It cannot be turned off. Are you kidding me? Either the white noise has to be turned waaaay down so that you can't hear the message or you have to turn it off at night. Either way you don't get white noise. Some of the things you can program it to do are cute, but honestly the more I read up on issues that I find the more I get the impression that this whole product is overly complicated and poorly designed.

Text: The Amazon Echo Dot Kids (newest model) is an absolute hit in our household! My kids love asking Alexa questions, setting timers, and listening to their favorite stories and songs. It‚Äôs also a helpful tool for routines like bedtime and homework.If you‚Äôre looking for a smart speaker that‚Äôs fun, educational, and safe for kids, this is the perfect choice. Text: We recently added the Echo Dot Owl to our home, and it has quickly become a favorite for my preschooler! The ability to control her nightlight and change its color to match her mood has made bedtime much more enjoyable. She loves experimenting with the different hues, creating a cozy atmosphere just for her.What really impressed me is how well Alexa responds to her little voice. Even when she doesn‚Äôt articulate clearly, Alexa understands her requests‚Äîmuch better than I expected! My daughter enjoys asking for music, and I appreciate that it pulls from her Spotify Kids account, ensuring that the songs playing are always age-appropriate.She‚Äôs also discovered the joy of storytelling; she frequently asks Alexa to tell her a story. We‚Äôve started using it as a timer for her activities and even as a gentle alarm in the mornings.On top of all these fantastic features, the design of the Echo Dot Owl is super cute! We‚Äôre even considering getting the little nest stand for added charm. Overall, this device has been a wonderful addition to our home, providing entertainment, comfort, and a touch of magic for my child. I highly recommend it for any family with young kids!
